remarks: The law of concretion for a binary relation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
statement:
opelopabga.1 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
brabga.2 $e |- R = { <. x , y >. | ph } $.
brabga $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( A R B <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ps x y $.
